derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'sunflower'): from French, or from Italian girasole, from girare 'to turn' + sole 'sun' (because the sunflower turns to follow the path of the sun)

means.word_mean: 1. an opal with flaming orange and yellow and red colors
2. tall perennial with hairy stems and leaves; widely cultivated for its large irregular edible tubers
